# Overview of `Django`

`Django` is a web framework used in `Python`.

# Install `Django`

In terminal:

```{python}
#| eval: false

python3 -m pip install Django==5.0.4 # install Django on Mac
py -m pip install Django==5.0.4 # install Django on Windows
```

Verify installation:

```{python}
#| eval: false

python3 -m django --version # gets Django version
```
